name: Judy Greenman
what_you_do: Judy Greenman, founder of Body Brain Freedom Academy, empowers people to move freely and live fully using a unique blend of CFR®, Integrated Awareness®, Feldenkrais Method® and Somatic Coaching Techniques.
signature_programs: Advanced Cortical Field Reeducation® (CFR) Five More Powerful Days for Deeper Healing, Accessing the Genius Within: Healing Physical and Emotional Injury With Cortical Field Re-Education® and Feldenkrais®, CFR 2
business_focus: Empowering people to move freely and live fully using a blend of CFR, Integrated Awareness, Feldenkrais Method and Somatic Coaching Techniques.
service_provided: speaking engagements, transformational retreats, virtual courses, private coaching
